Reviews.Title: Love/Hate
Reviews.Author: Ashley "follower of Christ"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone because it is cute and I just love the older blackberry but I hate it because one week after I got it, the charger port inside the phone broke and decided it was going to wobble around inside the phone and so making charging impossible.

Reviews.Title: Definitely perfect.
Reviews.Author: Deadlysin0721
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this phone and it works exceptionally great. It is definitely the perfect phone for me, even if it is a later model. I've been wanting one for the longest time and now that I finally have one, I never want to let it go.

Reviews.Title: Better than my Iphone 3.  Miss it greatly!!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen E. Witte
Reviews.Content: Liked better than my IPhone 3!  Switched to another service and Iphone came with new service.  Miss my Blackberry!  I found to be so much easier to use and very reliable.

Reviews.Title: Gets worse as you use it
Reviews.Author: Marsha Neumann
Reviews.Content: I got it and thought "what a cute phone!" but as I've used it I find the battery loses steam really fast, the sound quality is a hinderance if you're having more than a short conversation, getting online is impossibly slow and probably only good for emergencies. All in all, I find it hard to do anymore than keep track of my emails and make calls. I'm spoiled. After having an IPhone, which is a Rolls Royce, this little beat up but waxed Chevy is such a dinasour. Interesting experiment but learn from my experience and don't buy it to begin with and waste your money.
